name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Have been wearing Dickies for 20 years now. The quality is always the same (excellent).

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Excellent brand and quality. I’ve purchased a pair directly from dickies previously that fit perfectly. The problem is as has been 3 times now that when I’ve purchased size 40 inch shorts from overseas they have sent me 36 inch. Sent back first pair as they paid for postage. I received a full refund. I’m left with the second pair of carpenter denim shorts as it would cost me almost the price I paid for the shorts in postage back to the USA. Also I have a month to drop off this pair at a parcel return which is hard as the closest is 4-5 hours drive away. Bit of a scam really if you’re not from a major city that has a return facility. Be warned if you’re looking for larger sizes. I won’t be buying off here .

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Reading the reviews, and wanting them to be baggy like my other shorts from the 90's i ordered 2 sizes up.  Im 6ft and medium build usually a 36, so i ordered a 40.I received a 36, but the fit really well, they are the exact same size/shape as an old pair of size 38 from jayjays int he 2000's. Doesnt make any sense, but i am happy with the product i received.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: With Dickies, you play a lottery as to whether your purchase will fit. Sure, you may be a size 36, and own other dickies pants that are a size 36 that fit well, doesn't mean that your new size 36 purchase will fit. They are way too small, would be tight on a size 34 person.As it's an Amazon US purchase, if I opted to return the item and take out the return postage cost Amazon has set, I would be refunded 51cents.  Might as well try to flog them on ebay now.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: The sizing is ridiculous, I bought the size up as I understand they come small still nowhere near.A waste of time

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Sizing not right, far too small.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Quality and customer svc was second to none but the shorts were a 13inch wide leg far far to wide looked like I was wearing a skirt pmsl  appart from that highly recomend

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Very comfortable.  Easy to wear when you need to be a bit smarters in shorts or just kicking about in the countryside.  Perfect.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Me quedan como esperaba. Personalmente no quería que me quedaran como en la imagen que se muestra así que me pedí una talla más grande. Mido aproximadamente 1,80 metros y compre una 32 x Regular. Me cubren las rodillas como deseaba. Perfectos.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 3 August 2018

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Bought theses and a pair of Dickies pants. Both in size 36, the pants fit perfectly, but the shorts are a little on the small side.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Hatte die Hose in "33" bestellt, geliefert wurde "32" was für mich viel zu eng war. Habe jetzt in Größe "34" nochmal bestellt.  Auf die Rücksendebestätigung warte ich jetzt leider noch.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 9 February 2020

reviews: problème récurent avec dickies, taille haute sur ce modèle, fait du 42 habituellement, pour le porté sur les hanches il me faudrait un 46 ...

reviews: en effet prévoir 1 taille au dessus. sinon la qualité est là; ne bouge pas aux premiers lavages. produit conforme à la photo.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Me quedo más una talla más chica de lo que la pedí, pero es buena la calidad de la prenda

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: conforme à la qualité dickies mais un poil plus serré à la ceinture que leurs pantalons pour un port decontracté voir pour une taille d eplus
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on 16 June 2018

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: So what my son was looking for comfortable and casual thick material

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Feel like they are made of the worst burlap sacks of your nightmares. They fit so small and even with loads of fabric softener, they probably worked like a bullet proof vest

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Meine zweiten Shorts von Dickies. Sie sitzen perfekt, auch wenn die Größe im Vgl. zu meinen Jeans anders ausfällt. Bei Jeans habe ich eine Bundweite von 30 und bei den Shorts brauche ich 32.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I bought these shorts last year and they are holding up well; however they could use a couple of design improvements. I work in a maintenance facility where I have to occasionally lay on my back and when I do my cell phone falls out of the side pocket on the pant leg, I suggest adding a pocket flap. Also the belt loops are so small they barely accommodate a 1 inch belt, the belt loops should be increased in size to allow larger belts like leather.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Todo bien con el producto, Dickies, original, calidad, etc. El problema es que las tallas vienen reducidas. Yo uso pantalones Dickies y me queda bien la talla 32, pero esta me quedó como 28. Así que pidan 1 o 2 más grands

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Im 165cm in height.Weighing 65KG to 69KGUsually wear a waist size 30-31 for Jeans etc.After reading much reviews regarding this shorts, i took size 33. Overall its fits nice with a belt on.I suggest you took 2 size up.Example if you wore 34, take 36 or 37.Because if you take the size you are wering right now, tha chances are you CAN'T fit.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 21 February 2024

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Ich hab mir die Hose in meiner Standartgröße 32 bestellt und nicht mal ansatzweise zu bekommen. Ca. 3cm fehlten, dass sie überhaupt zu geht. Sie fällt mindestens zwei Größen kleiner aus und als ich sie mir nochmals in 34 bestellt habe stand dort auf dem Etikett zwar 34, aber von der Größe das exakt selbe Ergebnis wie bei der letzten und zwar dass 3cm fehlten, um sie überhaupt zu zu bekommen... Sehr enttäuschendes Ergebnis. Hab da definitiv mehr erwartet als so eine schwache qualitative Leistung.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Fit great, comfortable

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I’ve worn dickies my whole life and it’s getting harder and harder to find  the good thick kind in department stores. A lot of stores are selling the cheaper thinner versions with thinner material and thin little belt loops so I’m happy to see Amazon selling the good kind for a fair price. My only disappointment was the clasp above the zipper fell off sometime during the first day I wore them. I use a belt so my pants stay up  but it sucks not being able to clip/button the waist like normal

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I've been looking for Dickies brand shorts and found them on Amazon. I love them. Perfect fit and comfortable. I ordered 2 more since the price dropped. I would have ordered more even if the price didn't drop. Very satisfied and pleased.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I've been wearing dickies for decades, and would never change that
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 31 July 2023

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: First off DEFINITELY order one size bigger! I read several reviews that suggested the same and some others said the size was accurate. I ordered my typical 36 and they fit like a VERY small 34. I exchanged for a 38 and that fits great and like a 36. I can wear 34 but carry concealed so I need a bit extra and there is no way I could have carried with that 36. If fit so tight I couldn’t put even a finger in the wait. Aside from that they are great. I’m 6’3 and have a hard time finding shirts that TRULY are below the knee  but these truly are. The others that claim to be “below the knee” definitely do not but these do and for an awesome price! Only $14 when we ordered them! Durable and comfortable but don’t forget to save yourself the hassle of the exchange and just order a size up from the start.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 4 December 2023

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: My son likes this uses it for work

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I’m a skater and these pants are the best

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Will echo the "Order a size Up" comments, before I washed I tried them on and they were already 2" too small at the waist, but were massive everywhere else. Durable for sure, but they're going back.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 19 August 2023

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Small for the size ordered. The run small.
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 25 November 2023

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I wear 34 34. Tried them on and it was like trying to fit a whale in a garden hose. I've ordered plenty of these types of shirt with no issues. For some reason these ran too small.

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: My son has worn Dickies work shorts with the cell phone pocket for almost 23 years. He likes the length, comfort and quality. They go through a lot of washes and still look great!!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 28 September 2023

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I would try and get a size bigger. Was a little tight for me. But all in all they looked great. The length was great don't like shorts that don't go to my knees and these do. Thanks again
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 23 October 2022

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Finally replaced my 15 year old pair so I guess I'll update this review in 2038 and let you know how they held up!
date.of.review: Reviewed in the United States on 18 May 2023

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: Perfect for work

name: Dickies Men's 13 Inch Loose Fit Multi-Pocket Work Short
reviews: I ordered a size 34 without even thinking of looking at the reviews so that was my fault. They were too small. After reading what other people said I ordered a size up and they fit perfectly.
